project.name: Python
project.description: The Python project maintains ebuilds for the Python language itself and a lot of other packages using it.

longdescription.p: The Python project maintains dev-lang/python and most of dev-python/.

task.name: g-pypi
task.description: Create ebuilds from The Python Package Index automatically

longdescription.p: g-pypi is a tool for installing Python packages using information from PyPI without having to write an ebuild by hand.
g-pypi is a work in progress and not in portage yet. You can find the ebuild in the pythonhead overlay. Contributions from the community are welcomed.
Bugs for g-pypi releases in the pythonhead overlay should go to Gentoo's bugzilla. Feature requests and bug reports for the svn trunk should go to http://code.google.com/p/g-pypi

task.name: python-info
task.description: Shows how Python was compiled and information about all Python packages emerged

longdescription.p: python-info will show various information about Python and Python based packages you have emerged.
